name: Synthetic Turnip: A Spark of Hope
name_original: Synthetic Turnip: A Spark of Hope
description:
In this twist on the Jack O'Lantern tale, a little turnip lets a spark of hope carry him through the scariest night of the year.

All art, music, sound, and code assets the original work of team Synthetic turnip! (some code derived from official unity documentation and tutorials). No external assets were used.

Some art assistance was provided by Brian Sanchez (mentor) and some instructors at RMCAD.
